name: Diamond Deck Championship
description:
This is a Demo release of Diamond Deck Championship, a card game where you use the same set of cards in three wildly distinct games!

In this release two full sets of cards are available and two of three game modes are playable, one available over local or remote multiplayer!

For local multiplayer, see the attached server builds for your system!

Linux also probably works for the game client but we haven't tested it yet!

Built with Go 1.16 using Oak.
